resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/78269</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>78269</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>b7c929e3-227d-11d8-89de-faf1df86d935#1#6</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A kínai társadalom tagozódása</string>
            <string language="en">The division of the Chinese society</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Abteilung der chinesischen Gesellschaft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La division de la société chinoise</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A divisão da sociedade chinesa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La divisione della società cinese</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το τμήμα της κινεζικής κοινωνίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La división de la sociedad china</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A kínai társadalom tagozódásának bemutatása - parasztság - hivatalnokok és a másodrendű városiak: kereskedők, iparosok</string>
            <string language="en">The division of the Chinese society - peasantry, officials and the second-rate townspeople: merchants, craftsmen</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Az Európán kívüli világ,  életmód,  gazdaság,  államigazgatás,  </string>
            <string language="en">The world beyond Europe, way of living, economy, state administration</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Abteilung der chinesischen Gesellschaft - 
Bauernschaft, Beamte und die Zweitkinetik Stadtmenschen: 
Kaufleute, Handwerker</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La division de la société chinoise - 
paysannerie, fonctionnaires et les citadins de deuxième-cadence : 
les négociants, artisans</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A divisão da sociedade chinesa - peasantry, 
oficiais e populações da cidade da segundo-taxa: comerciantes,
artesãos</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La divisione della società cinese - 
peasantry, funzionari ed i cittadini di secondo-tasso: 
commercianti, artigiani</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το τμήμα της κινεζικής κοινωνίας - αγροτιά, ανώτεροι 
υπάλληλοι και μέτρια townspeople: έμποροι, βιοτέχνες</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La división de la sociedad china - peasantry, 
funcionarios y los ciudadanos de la segundo-tarifa: 
comerciantes, artesanos</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Welt über Europa, Methode des Lebens, Wirtschaft, 
Staatsverwaltung hinaus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le monde au delà de l'Europe, voie de la vie, 
économie, gestion d'état</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O mundo além de Europa, maneira de viver, economia, 
administração de estado</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il mondo oltre Europa, modo di vivere, economia, 
dichiara la gestione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο κόσμος πέρα από την Ευρώπη, τρόπος, οικονομία, κρατική 
διοίκηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El mundo más allá de Europa, manera de vivir, 
economía, administración de estado</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-T-LRE">15-16</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>presentation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:Panem Kiadó
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>590</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>78269</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=b7c929e3-227d-11d8-89de-faf1df86d935&v=1&b=6</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
